name: The Boy in The Plastic Bubble
discription: The girl next door makes a teen born with immune deficiencies want to leave his germ-free bubble.

comments.author: Bob McGee
comments.content: The poor boy never made it out of the bubble. SAD!

comments.author: Joe McFarce
comments.content: You didn't watch the whole movie! he did make it out. You are a goon

comments.author: Aiden Nelson
comments.content:
Flash Gordon is my favorite early sci fi movie character
        by far! His acting is so genuine

comments.author: Sam Behrens
comments.content: I actually prefer Shatner, I feel like he's more funny and relatable.

name: Glen or Glenda?
discription:
A psychiatrist tells two stories: one of a transvestite
    (Glen or Glenda), the other of a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

comments.author: Max Hancock
comments.content: Interesting representation of transgender people before discussing it was really allowed

comments.author: Bonnie Jenkins
comments.content: Honestly, I didn't like it very much. The plot was pretty boring and the acting was a hard pass

comments.author: Alberto Rincon
comments.content:
This movie was fammtastic! it was almost like I was physically
        in the 20's getting opressed by bad drug policy

comments.author: Adam Dizay
comments.content:
I always thought that the devil's cabbage was a no go, but
        now I know for sure thanks to this video.

name: Dead On Arrival
discription:
Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few
    days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.

comments.author: Will McAllister
comments.content: Like if you are watching this in 2017

name: Evil Brain From Outer Space
discription:
A monstrous evil brain from outer space leads his minions on
    a crusade to conquer the universe, and unleashes hideous monsters on Earth
    that spread deadly diseases.

comments.author: Christian Root
comments.content: This movie inspires me to get up in the morning

name: Night of the Living Dead
discription:
The film follows a group of characters who barricade
    themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these flesh
    eating monsters.
